item.title: Federal special education staff may get their jobs back. But for how long?
item.description: A new deal to end the government shutdown may briefly restore staff to U.S. Education Department offices that had been gutted by layoffs.

item.title: 'We were gone far too long.' House members reflect on longest shutdown
